Package address

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
address.Menu
public class Menu extends Object
Menu class is used to display menu options to the user to modify an AddressBook.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final Scanner
    scanner
    The scanner used to read input.

  • Constructor Summary

    Creates a menu that reads from the system input.

    Creates a menu that reads from custom input.

      Returns:

    • promptMenu

      public boolean promptMenu(AddressBook addressBook)
      Displays the menu options to the user and prompts the user for input, then executes the selected menu item.
      Returns:
      True if the user selects 'f' to quit. False otherwise.

    • loadFile

      public void loadFile(AddressBook addressBook)
      Reads entries from a file given by the user.
      Parameters:
      addressBook - The AddressBook to add entries to.

    • addEntry

      public void addEntry(AddressBook addressBook)
      Adds an AddressEntry given by the user to the AddressBook.
      Parameters:
      addressBook - The AddressBook to add an entry to.

    • removeEntry

      public void removeEntry(AddressBook addressBook)
      Removes an entry from the AddressBook chosen by the user based on the last name of the entry.
      Parameters:
      addressBook - The AddressBook to remove an entry from.

    • findEntry

      public void findEntry(AddressBook addressBook)
      Finds and prints address entries matching the lastName given by the user from the AddressBook.
      Parameters:
      addressBook - The address book to search from.

    • listEntries

      public void listEntries(AddressBook addressBook)
      Lists each entry in the AddressBook in alphabetical order by last name.
      Parameters:
      addressBook - The address book to list from entries.

    • findEntries

      private Collection<AddressEntry> findEntries(AddressBook addressBook, String lastName)
      Finds and prints address entries matching the lastName from the AddressBook.
      Parameters:
      addressBook - The address book to search from.
      lastName - The last name to filter entries by.
      Returns:
      A Collection<AddressEntry> of address entries with entries that match the given last name.

    • promptEntry

      private AddressEntry promptEntry()
      Prompts the user to enter information to create an AddressEntry.
      Returns:
      The new address entry AddressEntry.
